data.title: RABBIT & SNAIL
data.meta_description: https://vimeo.com/ondemand/togetherforever2023 OUT NOW: Together Forever! Nanette Newman & Bryan Forbes (2023) Narrated by Sir Derek Jacobi, we explore the lives and careers of Nanette Newman and Bryan Forbes who were at the heart of British film for over four decades and assess their lasting impact on film history. For more information either visit our Together…
data.text:
AT HOME WITH DEREK FOWLDS (2020)

Derek Fowlds shows us around his home and talks openly about some of the many famous names that he’s worked with over the years, from Basil Brush to Sir Humphrey, and from Dirk Bogarde to Alistair Sim.

FILM PROJECTIONS (2018) – Short

We go behind the scenes of The Dome, Worthing, one of the world’s oldest cinemas who were faced with a very difficult challenge, move away from film and embrace digital projection, or close their doors.

“A fascinating insight into the life of Peter Cushing.”

“Simply fantastic. So wonderful to see all those great people who made my childhood again. Thanks for all the laughs.“

“This is simply marvellous.“

“Love the recap of this extraordinarily talented actress. Her performances never ring false. Thanks!“

“Great actor, played his part so well and had great chemistry with Anna, loving these documetaries.“
